author: jorton
msg: * acinclude.m4: Pick up OpenSSL libs/cflags from pkg-config.
infinite loop in ssl_io_input_getline if connection is aborted without
anonymous shm segment by default or fall back on name-based shm.

author: jorton
msg: hook to APR_HOOK_FIRST to ensure it runs before the mod_suexec hook.
